content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_btn title=”CONTACT FOR ADMISSION” style=”gradient” size=”lg” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-info” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2Fucaitcourse%20||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

United College of Aviation, Science & Management in collaboration with US based company 45pi Tech is going to offer the following professional IT Courses:

  • Web Development
  • Freelancing
  • Freelancing Learning & Earning
  • Digital Marketing
  • E-Commerce & F-Commerce

*Weekend & Friday classes will be available for the professionals.

Course orientation: September 1, 2018

For any question, please contact 01970 608071 or email avijit@uca.edu.bd

Course Fee & Duration

Course Name

Duration

Fee
Web Development 3 Months BDT 15,000/-
Web Development 15 Days BDT 7,000/-
Freelancing 3 Months BDT 15,000/-
Freelancing 15 Days BDT 7,000/-
Freelancing Learning & Earning 1 Day BDT 3,000/-
Digital Marketing 3 Days BDT 5,000/-
Digital Marketing 1 Day BDT 3,000/-
E-Commerce & F-Commerce 3 Days BDT 5,000/-
E-Commerce & F-Commerce
 1 Day BDT 3,000/-
  • For Friday/Saturday Classes, additional 500/- will be added.
  • 3 Months courses > 3 days a week, 12 weeks, 36 classes
  • 15 days courses > 7 classes
  • 3 days courses > 3 classes ( 4 hrs/each)
  • 1 day courses > 1 class (6 hours)
  • Certificates will be provided after completion

Instructor:

Avijit Roy Kabyo, Lecturer, Dept. of CSE, UCASM

Co-founder, 45pi Tech, New York, USA
Sr. Software Engineer, Carpet Culture, New York, USA
Google Product Expert, Google Developer, Google Trusted Tester
Sr. Web Engineer, SEO Expert & Digital Marketing Advisor[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
